title: 6.22 has come and gone and the chromas were never released
body: Patch 6.22 notes promised us that Dragonslayer Braum and Battle Regalia Poppy would get chroma packs, but patch 6.23 is out and still no chroma's.

replies.body: Unfortunately, I don't have any visibility new skins or content until it's been released (and announced on the [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page.)  You may want to ask about this over at the [Art ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art)boards.  Good luck!
